get.description: Fetch a list of tournaments with optional filters.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External ID of the user. If provided, user-specific fields like 'hasJoined' will be populated.

items.description: This is an auto-filled tournament used for rapid testing scenarios.

get.description: Fetch detailed information about a specific tournament.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tournament

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External ID of the user. If provided, user-specific fields like 'hasJoined' will be populated.

data.description: This is an auto-filled tournament used for rapid testing scenarios.

get.description: Fetch the rules for a specific tournament.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tournament

get.description: Fetch the points system for a specific tournament.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tournament

get.description: Fetch the prize distribution for a specific tournament.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tournament

post.description: Register a user for a tournament using their external ID. Note: Before joining, the user must have linked their user game ID (refer to /api-reference/create-user-game-id-mapping). This endpoint is for solo participant tournaments only, not for team or instant registrations.

parameters.name: tournamentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tournament

parameters.name: participantExternalId
parameters.description: The external ID of the participant

409.description: Conflict - User already registered or game account not linked

error.message: Participant is not eligible: User already registered
Link your game account to join

post.description: Register a team for a tournament. This endpoint is for team registration only where 'instantRegistrations' is false. For paid tournaments, payment details must be provided.

parameters.name: tournamentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tournament

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team

409.description: Conflict - Team already registered or not eligible

description.example: This is an auto-filled tournament used for rapid testing scenarios.
